titles.title: A bill to amend the Commodity Exchange Act to require energy commodities to be traded only on regulated markets, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5631-5632)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary:
6/12/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Commodity Exchange Act to require energy commodities to be traded only on regulated markets.
